structure.unit: E IMPLEMENTATION OF FEDERAL HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PROGRAMS

law.text: Agencies of state government shall respond, within the confines of the Kentucky Emergency Operations Plan and agency policies, to releases of hazardous substances. Each response shall be consistent with the hazardous materials annex of the Kentucky Emergency Operations Plan. If an on-scene response is required by the Kentucky Emergency Operations Plan or by agency policy, state agencies shall cooperate with one another and with local emergency response organizations and with the party or parties responsible for that release.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 74, effective July 15, 1998.
